rulePubDate:
@js:if(String(result).match(/issue-article/)){a=String(result).match(/作者([^<]+)</);result="文章·"+a[1]}else{if(String(result).match(/issue-picture/)){a=String(result).match(/class="date">([^"]+)<span class="issue-no">([^"]+)<\/span>/);
result="图文·"+a[1]+a[2]}else{result="问答"}}
